name: Cave Adventure (Leigh Norton)
description:
A 2D Adventure!

Its been a bit since I last uploaded a game but that's because I've been doing a lot of learning! Please play this short demo of what I'm working on and let me know what you think!

If you get stuck or die, just press R to restart the level!

Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys - Move

Space - Jump

Ctrl or Mouse Click - Attack

R - Reload current level

Mouse - Menu
